name: Treehouse of Horror III
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Al Jean, Mike Reiss, Jay Kogen, Wallace Wolodarsky, Sam Simon, Jon Vitti
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: An evil Krusty the Clown doll makes life hell for the Simpsons, Marge is captured by a giant ape who falls in love with her, and Bart inadvertently raises the dead.
